privacyPolicy.full:
# REMISIO APPLICATION PRIVACY POLICY

**Effective Date:** 2 July 2025  
**Version:** 1.0

---

## 1. BASIC INFORMATION

### 1.1 Data Controller
The controller of your personal data is:

**Signum Scientific Club**  
Address: Plac Grunwaldzki 13, 50-370 Wrocław, Poland  
Email: knsignum@gmail.com  
Website: https://www.knsignum.pl/

### 1.2 Data-protection contact
For any data-protection matters please email **knsignum@gmail.com**

### 1.3 What is Remisio
Remisio is a digital health platform (mobile app for patients + web dashboard for doctors) supporting people with Crohn’s Disease (CD) and Ulcerative Colitis (UC).

---

## 2. WHAT DATA WE COLLECT & WHY

### 2.1 Patient data
- Identification: first name, last name, email, phone
- Demographic: date of birth, gender, height, weight
- Medical: disease type (CD/UC), test results, symptoms, medication, diet, surveys
- Technical: IP address, device info, activity logs

**Purposes**
1. **Therapeutic** – therapy management, health monitoring, communication with physician
2. **Scientific** – GI-disease research, AI model training (pseudonymised data)

### 2.2 Doctor data
- Identification: first name, last name, email
- Professional: specialty, workplace, credentials

**Purpose:** providing medical services and patient-data access

---

## 3. LEGAL BASES

### 3.1 Consent (Art. 6 (1)(a) & Art. 9 (2)(a) GDPR)
- **Therapeutic purposes** – consent covers processing for therapy
- **Scientific purposes** – consent for use in research / AI (pseudonymised)
- **Third-party sharing** – separate consent for any recipients other than the treating physician

### 3.2 Public interest (Art. 9 (2)(j) GDPR)
Scientific research in the field of public health with appropriate safeguards

---

## 4. DATA SHARING

### 4.1 Recipients
- **Doctors** – access to data of their own patients
- **Research institutions** – pseudonymised data with patient consent
- **IT providers** – Linode/Akamai (hosting) under DPA

### 4.2 International transfers
Data stored on Linode/Akamai servers in Frankfurt (Germany).

---

## 5. RETENTION
We keep data while you use Remisio and up to 5 years after therapy ends, unless law requires longer.

---

## 6. USER RIGHTS
- Access
- Rectification
- Erasure (“right to be forgotten”)
- Restriction
- Objection
- Portability

Requests: **knsignum@gmail.com**

---

## 7. SECURITY
AES-256 encryption, TLS 1.3, backups, strict access control.

---

## 8. CHANGES
Updates are published in-app and on our website. See effective-date at top.

---

## 9. CONTACT
Email: **knsignum@gmail.com**  
Address: Plac Grunwaldzki 13, 50-370 Wrocław, Poland
